diff_act: 5.compare computed 'Message Digest' values with stored values

regen.absent_element: action to take when computed 'Message Digest' values do not match development records
regen.new_specification: The system shall trigger an investigation and initiate corrective action when a mismatch between computed 'Message Digest' values and development records is detected.

label: A verification failure shall will cause an alarm condition for the affected control unit.
absence: action of alarm for a verification failure
